title: Frequently Asked Questions
subtitle: Find answers to common questions about ZapAround's features, services, and travel planning tools.

q1.question: What is ZapAround?
q1.answer: ZapAround is a smart travel planning assistant that helps you discover, plan, and share your travel experiences. We combine AI-powered recommendations with real community insights to make travel planning seamless and enjoyable.

q2.question: How does ZapAround work?
q2.answer: ZapAround works by analyzing your travel preferences and combining them with real-time data and community insights. Simply input your destination and preferences, and we'll help you create personalized itineraries, find hidden gems, and connect with fellow travelers.

q3.question: Is ZapAround available worldwide?
q3.answer: Yes! ZapAround is available globally and supports travel planning for destinations worldwide. Our community of travelers contributes insights from all corners of the globe.

q4.question: Do I need to create an account?
q4.answer: While you can browse some features without an account, creating a free account unlocks the full potential of ZapAround, including saving trips, connecting with other travelers, and receiving personalized recommendations.

q5.question: How accurate are the recommendations?
q5.answer: Our recommendations combine AI analysis with real traveler experiences and are updated in real-time. We continuously improve our suggestions based on user feedback and changing travel conditions.

q6.question: Can I use ZapAround for group travel?
q6.answer: Absolutely! ZapAround has special features for group travel planning. You can collaborate with friends and family, share itineraries, and coordinate plans together in real-time.

q7.question: What makes ZapAround different from other travel apps?
q7.answer: ZapAround stands out by combining AI-powered planning with real community insights. We focus on personalization, real-time updates, and fostering genuine connections between travelers.

q8.question: Is my travel data secure?
q8.answer: Yes, we take data security seriously. All your travel information is encrypted and stored securely. We never share your personal data without your explicit consent.

q9.question: What languages does ZapAround support?
q9.answer: ZapAround is available in English, French, and Spanish. You can easily switch between languages in your profile settings, and all content including recommendations, descriptions, and user interface will be displayed in your chosen language.

q10.question: How does the translation feature work?
q10.answer: Our translation system automatically handles all content in your preferred language. When you switch languages, all text - including user-generated content, travel recommendations, and interface elements - is instantly available in your chosen language.

q11.question: Can I contribute translations or corrections?
q11.answer: Yes! We welcome community contributions to improve our translations. If you notice any inconsistencies or have suggestions for better translations, you can submit them through our feedback form in your profile settings.

q12.question: How do I reset my password?
q12.answer: Click the Forgot Password link on the login page and follow the instructions sent to your registered email address to securely reset your password.

q13.question: How can I delete my ZapAround account?
q13.answer: You can permanently delete your account from the Account Settings page. Navigate to Profile > Account > Delete Account and follow the confirmation steps. This action is irreversible and removes all personal data in accordance with GDPR regulations.

q14.question: What payment methods do you accept for subscriptions?
q14.answer: We process payments through our PCI-DSS-compliant partner Stripe. You can use all major credit and debit cards, Apple Pay, Google Pay, and other local payment options supported in your region.

q15.question: Is ZapAround free to use?
q15.answer: ZapAround offers a generous Free plan that includes core trip-planning features. For advanced collaboration tools, unlimited AI recommendations, and priority support, you can upgrade to one of our paid plans at any time.

q16.question: Does ZapAround work offline?
q16.answer: While an internet connection is required for real-time data and new searches, you can access previously saved trips and itineraries offline through your browser's local storage or our Progressive Web App support.

q17.question: How secure is my payment information?
q17.answer: All payment details are handled directly by Stripe and never touch our servers. Transactions are encrypted end-to-end, and we comply with the latest security standards (TLS 1.3, PCI DSS).

q18.question: Can I export or share my itinerary?
q18.answer: Absolutely! You can export itineraries as PDF, share a public link, or invite collaborators via email directly from the Trip Details page.

q19.question: How do I contact customer support?
q19.answer: You can reach our support team 24/7 via the in-app chat widget or by emailing support@zaparound.com. We typically respond within a few hours.

q20.question: How often is travel data updated?
q20.answer: Flight, accommodation, and activity data are updated in real time through our data partners. Community-generated reviews and recommendations sync instantly after moderation.
